trans-unit.source: Note: The appearance of a shape closed with ClosePath may be different to that of one closed by drawing a line to the origin, using one of the other commands, because the line ends are joined together (according to the stroke-linejoin setting), rather than just being placed at the same coordinates.

trans-unit.source: Note: With respect to gradients, SVG treats the transparent keyword differently than CSS. SVG does not calculate gradients in pre-multiplied space, so transparent really means transparent black. So, specifying a stop-color with the value transparent is equivalent to specifying a stop-color with the value black and a stop-opacity with the value 0.
trans-unit.target: 注意：关于渐变，SVG与CSS对待 transparent 关键字的方式不同。 SVG不会在预乘空间中计算渐变，因此 transparent 实际上意味着透明黑色。所以，指定 stop-color 与值 transparent 相当于指定一个 stop-color 与值 black 和 stop-opacity ，其值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can also use the xlink:href attribute on gradients too. When it is used, attributes and stops from one gradient can be included on another. In the above example, you wouldn't have to recreate all the stops in Gradient2.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您也可以在渐变上使用 xlink:href 属性。使用该属性时，可以将一个梯度的属性和停靠点包括在另一个梯度上。在上面的示例中，您无需在Gradient2中重新创建所有停靠点。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should avoid the use of id values that would be parsed as an SVG view specification (e.g., MyDrawing.svg#svgView(viewBox(0,200,1000,1000))) or a basic media fragment when used as a URL target fragment.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当用作URL目标片段时，应避免使用将被解析为SVG视图规范的 id 值（例如 MyDrawing.svg#svgView(viewBox(0,200,1000,1000)) ）或基本媒体片段。

trans-unit.source: Note: in Firefox 3+, rgba values are also allowed, and will give the same effect. But for compatibility with other viewers, it's often best to specify the fill/stroke opacity separately. If you specify both an rgba value and a fill/stroke opacity value, both will be applied.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Firefox 3+中， rgba 值也是允许的，并且会产生相同的效果。但是，为了与其他查看器兼容，通常最好单独指定 fill / stroke 不透明度。如果您同时指定了 rgba 值和 fill / stroke 不透明度值，则将两者都应用。

trans-unit.target: 注：该 arcs 值作为SVG2被引入，并没有被广泛尚不支持，请参阅浏览器兼容性的详细信息，波纹管。

trans-unit.source: A <color> is either a keyword or a numerical RGB specification.

trans-unit.source: A <coordinate> is a length in the user coordinate system that is the given distance from the origin of the user coordinate system along the relevant axis (the x-axis for X coordinates, the y-axis for Y coordinates). Its syntax is the same as that for <length>.

trans-unit.source: A <coordinate> is a length in the user coordinate system that is the given distance from the origin of the user coordinate system along the relevant axis (the x-axis for X coordinates, the y-axis for Y coordinates). Its syntax is the same as that for <length>.
trans-unit.target: <coordinate>是用户坐标系中的长度，是沿着相关轴（X坐标的x轴，Y坐标的y轴）到用户坐标系原点的给定距离。它的语法与<length>相同。

trans-unit.source: A <coordinate> is a length in the user coordinate system that is the given distance from the origin of the user coordinate system along the relevant axis (the x-axis for X coordinates, the y-axis for Y coordinates). Its syntax is the same as that for <length>.

trans-unit.source: A <transform-list> is used to specify a list of coordinate system transformations. A detailed description of the possible values for a <transform-list> is given in the transform attribute definition.
trans-unit.target: <transform-list>用于指定坐标系转换的列表。<transform-list>的可能值的详细说明在 transform 属性定义中给出。

trans-unit.source: A Clock-value that represents a point in time relative to the beginning of the SVG document (usually the load or DOMReady event). Negative values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 一个Clock-value，它表示相对于SVG文档开始的时间点（通常是 load 或 DOMReady 事件）。负值有效。

trans-unit.source: A <funcIRI> reference to the file or element which provides the image of the cursor. On the <cursor> element, the xlink:href attribute is animatable.
trans-unit.target: 甲<funcIRI>参考文件或元件，其提供光标图像。在 <cursor> 元素上， xlink:href 属性是可动画的。

trans-unit.source: A <filter> element can define a region to which a given filter effect applies and can provide a resolution for any intermediate continuous tone images used to process any raster-based filter primitives.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <filter> 元件可限定到一个给定的过滤器效果应用于并且可以提供用于处理任何基于光栅的滤光器基元的任何中间连续色调的图像的分辨率的区域。

trans-unit.source: A <path> is the most general shape that can be used in SVG. Using a path element, you can draw rectangles (with or without rounded corners), circles, ellipses, polylines, and polygons. Basically any of the other types of shapes, bezier curves, quadratic curves, and many more.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <path> 是可以在SVG中使用的最一般的形状。使用 path 元素，您可以绘制矩形（带有或不带有圆角），圆形，椭圆形，折线和多边形。基本上是任何其他类型的形状，贝塞尔曲线，二次曲线等等。

trans-unit.source: A <polygon> is similar to a <polyline>, in that it is composed of straight line segments connecting a list of points. For polygons though, the path automatically connects the last point with the first, creating a closed shape.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <polygon> 类似于 <polyline> 的，因为它是由连接点的列表直线段。但是对于多边形，路径会自动将最后一个点与第一个点连接起来，从而创建一个封闭的形状。

trans-unit.source: A <polyline> is a group of connected straight lines. Since the list of points can get quite long, all the points are included in one attribute:
trans-unit.target: 甲 <polyline> 是一组连接的直线。由于点列表可能会很长，因此所有点都包含在一个属性中：

trans-unit.source: A URL reference identifying the image to render.

trans-unit.source: A URL reference that identifies the target element to discard. See the definition of href on animation elements for details on identifying a target element. Note, however, that unlike other animation elements, the <discard> element does not support the deprecated xlink:href attribute.
trans-unit.target: URL引用，用于标识要丢弃的目标元素。有关标识目标元素的详细信息，请参见动画元素上的 href 定义。但是请注意，与其他动画元素不同， <discard> 元素不支持不建议使用的 xlink:href 属性。

trans-unit.source: A URL reference to a <meshgradient> paint server.
trans-unit.target: 对 <meshgradient> 绘画服务器的URL引用。

trans-unit.source: A URL reference to a different <linearGradient> or <radialGradient> element.
trans-unit.target: 对另一个 <linearGradient> 或 <radialGradient> 元素的URL引用。

trans-unit.source: A URL reference to a different <pattern> element within the current SVG document. Any attributes which are defined on the referenced element which are not defined on this element are inherited by this element. If this element has no children, and the referenced element does (possibly due to its own href attribute), then this element inherits the children from the referenced element. Inheritance can be indirect to an arbitrary level; thus, if the referenced element inherits attributes or children due to its own href attribute, then the current element can inherit those attributes or children. On the <pattern> element, the href attribute is animatable.
trans-unit.target: 对当前SVG文档中其他 <pattern> 元素的URL引用。此元素继承在引用的元素上定义但未在此元素上定义的任何属性。如果此元素没有子元素，而被引用的元素却有子元素（可能是由于其自身的 href 属性），则此元素将从被引用的元素继承子元素。继承可以是间接的，可以是任意级别的。因此，如果引用的元素由于其自身的 href 属性而继承了属性或子级，则当前元素可以继承那些属性或子级。在 <pattern> 元素上， href 属性是可设置动画的。

trans-unit.source: A URL reference to a template element, which must be a different <hatch> element to be valid.
trans-unit.target: 对模板元素的URL引用，该元素必须是不同的 <hatch> 元素才有效。

trans-unit.source: A URL reference to a template element, which must be a different <meshgradient> element to be valid.

trans-unit.source: A URL reference to an element/fragment within an SVG document to be cloned.

trans-unit.source: A basic example is to add a blur effect to SVG content. While basic blurs can be achieved with the help of gradients, the blur filter is needed to do anything beyond.
trans-unit.target: 一个基本的例子是为SVG内容添加模糊效果。虽然可以借助渐变实现基本的模糊效果,但除此之外,还需要使用模糊滤镜来实现。

trans-unit.source: A clipping path is conceptually equivalent to a custom viewport for the referencing element. Thus, it affects the rendering of an element, but not the element's inherent geometry. The bounding box of a clipped element (meaning, an element which references a <clipPath> element via a clip-path property, or a child of the referencing element) must remain the same as if it were not clipped.
trans-unit.target: 剪裁路径在概念上等效于引用元素的自定义视口。因此，它影响元素的渲染，但不影响元素的固有几何形状。被裁剪的元素（即，通过 clip-path 属性引用 <clipPath> 元素的元素或引用元素的子元素）的边界框必须保持与未裁剪的状态相同。

trans-unit.source: A clipping path is conceptually equivalent to a custom viewport for the referencing element. Thus, it affects the rendering of an element, but not the element's inherent geometry. The bounding box of a clipped element (meaning, an element which references a <clipPath> element via a clip-path property, or a child of the referencing element) must remain the same as if it were not clipped.
trans-unit.target: 剪切路径在概念上等效于引用元素的自定义视口。因此，它影响元素的渲染，但不影响元素的固有几何形状。被裁剪的元素（即，通过 clip-path 属性引用 <clipPath> 元素的元素或引用元素的子元素）的边界框必须保持与未裁剪的状态相同。

trans-unit.source: A clipping path restricts the region to which paint can be applied. Conceptually, parts of the drawing that lie outside of the region bounded by the clipping path are not drawn.
trans-unit.target: 剪裁路径限制了可以涂抹颜料的区域。从概念上讲,位于剪裁路径所限定的区域之外的图形部分不会被绘制。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of exactly four numbers specifying, in order, the lower left x, lower left y, upper right x, and upper right y of the bounding box for the complete font.
trans-unit.target: 一个用逗号分隔的列表,正好是四个数字,依次指定完整字体的左下角x、左下角y、右上角x和右上角y的边界框。

trans-unit.target: 一个完整的例子

trans-unit.source: A good understanding of paths is important when drawing SVGs. While creating complex paths using an XML editor or text editor is not recommended, understanding how they work will allow to identify and repair display issues in SVGs.
trans-unit.target: 在绘制SVG时,对路径的良好理解非常重要。虽然不建议使用XML编辑器或文本编辑器创建复杂的路径,但了解它们的工作原理将有助于识别和修复SVG中的显示问题。

trans-unit.source: A matrix convolution is based on an n-by-m matrix (the convolution kernel) which describes how a given pixel value in the input image is combined with its neighboring pixel values to produce a resulting pixel value. Each result pixel is determined by applying the kernel matrix to the corresponding source pixel and its neighboring pixels. The basic convolution formula which is applied to each color value for a given pixel is:
trans-unit.target: 矩阵卷积是基于一个n乘m的矩阵(卷积核),它描述了输入图像中给定的像素值如何与其邻近的像素值相结合,以产生一个结果像素值。每一个结果像素都是通过将内核矩阵应用于相应的源像素和其邻近像素来确定的。对给定像素的每个颜色值应用的基本卷积公式是:。

trans-unit.source: A name corresponding to a defined color profile that is in the browser's color profile description database. The browser searches the color profile description database for a color profile description entry whose name descriptor matches <name> and uses the last matching entry that is found. If a match is found, the corresponding profile overrides an embedded profile inside an image. If no match is found, then the embedded profile inside the image is used.
trans-unit.target: 与浏览器的颜色配置文件描述数据库中已定义的颜色配置文件相对应的名称。浏览器在颜色配置文件描述数据库中搜索名称描述符与 <name> 匹配的颜色配置文件描述条目，并使用找到的最后一个匹配条目。如果找到匹配项，则相应的配置文件将覆盖图像内的嵌入式配置文件。如果找不到匹配项，则使用图像内的嵌入式配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Above is an example of a linear gradient being applied to a <rect> element. Inside the linear gradient are several <stop> nodes. These nodes tell the gradient what color it should be at certain positions by specifying an offset attribute for the position, and a stop-color attribute. This can be assigned directly or through CSS. The two methods have been intermixed for the purposes of this example. For instance, this one tells the gradient to start at the color red, change to transparent-black in the middle, and end at the color blue. You can insert as many stop colors as you like to create a blend that's as beautiful or hideous as you need, but the offsets should always increase from 0% (or 0 if you want to drop the % sign) to 100% (or 1). Duplicate values will use the stop that is assigned furthest down the XML tree. Also, like with fill and stroke, you can specify a stop-opacity attribute to set the opacity at that position (again, in FF3 you can also use rgba values to do this).
trans-unit.target: 上面是将线性梯度应用于 <rect> 元素的示例。线性渐变内部有几个 <stop> 节点。这些节点通过指定位置的 offset 属性和 stop-color 来告诉渐变在某些位置应为什么颜色属性。这可以直接分配，也可以通过CSS分配。为了本示例的目的，将两种方法混合在一起。例如，这一步告诉渐变从红色开始，在中间变为透明黑色，在蓝色结束。您可以根据需要插入任意数量的终止色，以创建所需的美丽或令人讨厌的混合色，但是偏移量应始终从0％（如果要删除％符号，则为0）增加到100％（或1） ）。重复值将使用在XML树最下方分配的停止位置。同样，与填充和描边一样，您可以指定 stop-opacity 属性以在该位置设置不透明度（同样，在FF3中，您也可以使用rgba值来执行此操作）。

trans-unit.source: After applying the kernelMatrix of the <feConvolveMatrix> element to the input image to yield a number, that number is divided by the value given to the divisor attribute to yield the final destination color value. A divisor that is the sum of all the matrix values tends to have an evening effect on the overall color intensity of the result.
trans-unit.target: 施加后 kernelMatrix 所述的 <feConvolveMatrix> 元件到所述输入图像，以产生一数字，该数字由下式给出的值除以 divisor 属性以产生最终目标色彩值。除数是所有矩阵值的总和，往往会对结果的整体颜色强度产生夜间影响。

trans-unit.source: After fetching the element references, an EventListener is established by calling addEventListener() on the slider control, to receive any input events which occur. These events will be sent any time the slider's value changes, even if the user hasn't stopped moving it, so we can responsively adjust the text width.
trans-unit.target: 提取元素引用后，通过调用滑块控件上的 addEventListener() 来建立 EventListener ，以接收发生的任何 input 事件。这些事件将在滑块值更改的任何时间发送，即使用户没有停止移动它也是如此，因此我们可以响应地调整文本宽度。

trans-unit.source: After removal of the target element, the <discard> element is no longer useful, therefore it is also discarded after the target element's removal. trans-unit.source: All the above transformations can be expressed by a 2x3 transformation matrix. trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference either to a <glyph> element in an SVG document or to an <altGlyphDef> element.
trans-unit.target: 一个<IRI>参考要么一个 <glyph> SVG文档中元件或一个 <altGlyphDef> 元素。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to a <glyph> element in an SVG document. The referenced <glyph> is rendered as an alternate glyph.
trans-unit.target: 对SVG文档中 <glyph> 元素的<IRI>引用。引用的 <glyph> 呈现为备用字形。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to a different <linearGradient> or <radialGradient> element within the current SVG document. Any <linearGradient> or <linearGradient> attributes which are defined on the referenced element which are not defined on this element are inherited by this element if this element is of the same type as the referenced element. If this element has no defined gradient stops, and the referenced element does (possibly due to its own xlink:href attribute), then this element inherits the gradient stop from the referenced element. Inheritance can be indirect to an arbitrary level; thus, if the referenced element inherits attribute or gradient stops due to its own xlink:href attribute, then the current element can inherit those attributes or gradient stops. On the gradient elements, the xlink:href attribute is animatable.
trans-unit.target: 对当前SVG文档中另一个 <linearGradient> 或 <radialGradient> 元素的<IRI>引用。如果此元素与引用元素具有相同的类型，则在此元素上继承在该元素上定义的，未在该元素上定义的任何 <linearGradient> 或 <linearGradient> 属性。如果此元素没有定义的渐变停止，而引用的元素确实存在（可能由于其自身的 xlink:href 属性），则此元素将从引用的元素继承渐变停止。继承可以是间接的，可以是任意级别的。因此，如果引用的元素继承属性或由于其自身而导致渐变停止 xlink:href 属性，则当前元素可以继承这些属性或渐变停止。在渐变元素上， xlink:href 属性是可动画的。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to a different <pattern> element within the current SVG document. Any attributes which are defined on the referenced element which are not defined on this element are inherited by this element. If this element has no children, and the referenced element does (possibly due to its own xlink:href attribute), then this element inherits the children from the referenced element. Inheritance can be indirect to an arbitrary level; thus, if the referenced element inherits attributes or children due to its own xlink:href attribute, then the current element can inherit those attributes or children. On the <pattern> element, the xlink:href attribute is animatable.
trans-unit.target: 对当前SVG文档中另一个 <pattern> 元素的<IRI>引用。此元素继承在引用的元素上定义但未在此元素上定义的任何属性。如果此元素没有子元素，而被引用的元素却有子元素（可能是由于其自身的 xlink:href 属性），则此元素将从被引用的元素继承子元素。继承可以是间接的，可以是任意级别的。因此，如果引用的元素由于其自身的 xlink:href 属性而继承了属性或子级，则当前元素可以继承那些属性或子级。在 <pattern> 元素上， xlink:href 属性是可设置动画的。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to an element whose character data content shall be used as character data for this <tref> element. On the <tref> element, the xlink:href attribute is animatable.
trans-unit.target: 对元素的<IRI>引用，该元素的字符数据内容应用作该 <tref> 元素的字符数据。在 <tref> 元素上， xlink:href 属性是可动画的。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to an element/fragment within an SVG document. On the <use> element, the xlink:href attribute is animatable.
trans-unit.target: 对SVG文档中元素/片段的<IRI>引用。在 <use> 元素上， xlink:href 属性是可动画的。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to an external resource containing the script code.
trans-unit.target: 对包含脚本代码的外部资源的<IRI>引用。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to another <filter> element within the current SVG document. Any attributes which are defined on the referenced <filter> element which are not defined on this element are inherited by this element. If this element has no defined filter nodes, and the referenced element has defined filter nodes (possibly due to its own xlink:href attribute), then this element inherits the filter nodes defined from the referenced <filter> element. Inheritance can be indirect to an arbitrary level; thus, if the referenced <filter> element inherits attributes or its filter node specification due to its own xlink:href attribute, then the current element can inherit those attributes or filter node specifications. On the <filter> element, the xlink:href attribute is animatable.
trans-unit.target: 对当前SVG文档中另一个 <filter> 元素的<IRI>引用。在引用的 <filter> 元素上定义的，未在此元素上定义的任何属性都将被该元素继承。如果此元素没有定义的过滤器节点，并且引用的元素具有定义的过滤器节点（可能由于其自身的 xlink:href 属性），则此元素继承从引用的 <filter> 元素定义的过滤器节点。继承可以是间接的，可以是任意级别的。因此，如果引用的 <filter> 元素由于其自身的 xlink:href 而继承了属性或其过滤器节点规范属性，则当前元素可以继承那些属性或过滤器节点规范。在 <filter> 元素上， xlink:href 属性是可动画的。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to the <path> element onto which the text will be rendered. On the <textPath> element, the xlink:href attribute is animatable.
trans-unit.target: 对 <path> 元素的<IRI>引用，文本将在其上呈现。在 <textPath> 元素上， xlink:href 属性是可设置动画的。

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to the <path> element which defines the motion path.

trans-unit.source: An <IRI> reference to the element which is the target of this animation and which therefore will be modified over time. The target element must be part of the current SVG document. If the xlink:href attribute is not provided, then the target element will be the immediate parent element of the current animation element.
trans-unit.target: 一个<IRI>参照作为本动画的目标并因此将随时间被修改的元素。目标元素必须是当前SVG文档的一部分。如果未提供 xlink:href 属性，则目标元素将是当前动画元素的直接父元素。

trans-unit.source: Apart from the full SVG recommendations, the working group at the W3C introduced SVG Tiny and SVG Basic in 2003. These two profiles are aimed mainly at mobile devices. The first, SVG Tiny, should yield graphics primitives for small devices with low capabilities. SVG Basic offers many features of full SVG, but doesn't include the ones which are hard to implement or heavy to render (like animations). In 2008, SVG Tiny 1.2 became a W3C Recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 除了完整的SVG建议之外,W3C的工作组在2003年还推出了SVG Tiny和SVG Basic。这两个配置文件主要针对移动设备。第一种,SVG Tiny,应该为低功能的小型设备产生图形基元。SVG Basic提供了完整SVG的许多功能,但不包括那些难以实现或重度渲染的功能(如动画)。2008年,SVG Tiny 1.2成为了W3C的建议。

trans-unit.source: As a slight aside, in Gecko circles seem to have trouble drawing if their radius is set to something less than 0.075 (it is currently unknown whether this is a bug in the pattern element or not). trans-unit.source: As a slight aside, in Gecko circles seem to have trouble drawing if their radius is set to something less than 0.075 (it is currently unknown whether this is a bug in the pattern element or not). To work around that it is probably best to avoid drawing in "objectBoundingBox" units unless you have to.

trans-unit.source: As an XML dialect, SVG is namespaced. It is important to understand the concept of namespaces and how they are used if you plan to author SVG content. Versions of SVG viewers prior to the release of Firefox 1.5 unfortunately paid scant attention to namespaces, but they are essential to multi-XML dialect supporting user agents such as Gecko-based browsers which must be very strict. Take some time to understand namespaces now and it will save you all sorts of headaches in the future.
trans-unit.target: 作为XML方言，SVG是命名空间。如果您打算编写SVG内容，那么了解名称空间的概念以及如何使用它们很重要。不幸的是，在Firefox 1.5之前的SVG查看器版本很少注意名称空间，但是它们对于支持XML的多XML语言支持用户代理（例如基于Gecko的浏览器）必须非常严格。现在花一些时间来了解名称空间，它将在以后为您节省各种麻烦。

trans-unit.source: As an aside, it's useful to know that namespace prefixes can also be used for element names. This tells the user agent that that particular element (but not its children this time!) belongs to the namespace assigned to the prefix. Knowing this will save you some confusion if you come across markup like in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 作为一个旁观者,知道命名空间前缀也可以用于元素名是很有用的,这将告诉用户代理该元素(但这次不是它的子代!)属于分配给前缀的命名空间。这就告诉用户代理,那个特定的元素(但这次不是它的子元素!)属于分配给前缀的命名空间。如果你遇到像下面这个例子中的标记,知道这一点就可以避免一些混乱。

trans-unit.source: As of Chrome 45, SMIL animations are deprecated in favor of CSS animations and Web animations.
trans-unit.target: 从Chrome 45开始,SMIL动画被废弃,转而使用CSS动画和Web动画。

trans-unit.source: As of Internet Explorer 9, all major browsers support SVG: IE 9, Mozilla Firefox, Safari, Google Chrome and Opera. Mobile devices with Webkit-based browsers also support SVG. On older or smaller devices, chances are that SVG Tiny is supported.
trans-unit.target: 从Internet Explorer 9开始,所有主流浏览器都支持SVG:IE 9、Mozilla Firefox、Safari、Google Chrome和Opera。使用基于Webkit的浏览器的移动设备也支持SVG。在较旧或较小的设备上,有可能支持SVG Tiny。

trans-unit.source: As their name suggests, namespace prefixes are used to prefix parameter and element names. This is done by putting the namespace prefix and a colon before the parameter name as shown on the <script> element in the example above. This tells the user agent that that particular parameter belongs to the namespace assigned to the namespace prefix (XLink), and is a parameter that can be used with the same meaning on other elements.
trans-unit.target: 顾名思义，名称空间前缀用于为参数和元素名称添加前缀。这是通过将名称空间前缀和冒号放在参数名称之前来完成的，如上例中的 <script> 元素所示。这告诉用户代理该特定参数属于分配给名称空间前缀（XLink）的名称空间，并且是可以在其他元素上以相同含义使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: As with the gradientUnits attribute used above, patterns also have an attribute, patternUnits, which specifies the units that these attributes will take. It defaults to "objectBoundingBox" as it did above, so a value of 1 is scaled to the width/height of the object you're applying the pattern to. Since, in this case, we wanted the pattern to repeat 4 times horizontally and vertically, the height and width are set to 0.25. This means the pattern's width/height is only 0.25 of the total box size.
trans-unit.target: 与上面使用的 gradientUnits 属性一样，模式也有一个属性 patternUnits ，它指定这些属性将采用的单位。像上面一样，它默认为“ objectBoundingBox”，因此将值1缩放为您要向其应用模式的对象的宽度/高度。由于在这种情况下，我们希望图案在水平和垂直方向重复4次，因此高度和宽度设置为0.25。这意味着图案的宽度/高度仅为盒子总尺寸的0.25。

trans-unit.source: As with the gradientUnits attribute used above, patterns also have an attribute, patternUnits, which specifies the units that these attributes will take. It defaults to "objectBoundingBox" as it did above, so a value of 1 is scaled to the width/height of the object you're applying the pattern to. Since, in this case, we wanted the pattern to repeat 4 times horizontally and vertically, the height and width are set to 0.25. This means the pattern's width/height is only 0.25 of the total box size.
trans-unit.target: 与上面使用的 gradientUnits 属性一样，模式也有一个属性 patternUnits ，它指定这些属性将采用的单位。像上面一样，它默认为 "objectBoundingBox" ，因此将值 1 缩放到您要向其应用模式的对象的 width / height 。由于在这种情况下，我们希望图案在水平和垂直方向上重复4次，因此将 height 和 width 设置为 0.25 。这意味着图案的 width / height 仅为盒子总尺寸的 0.25 。

trans-unit.source: Basic coloring can be done by setting two attributes on the node: fill and stroke. Fill sets the color inside the object and stroke sets the color of the line drawn around the object. You can use the same css color naming schemes that you use in HTML, whether that's color names (that is red), rgb values (that is rgb(255,0,0)), hex values, rgba values, etc.

trans-unit.source: Batik is a set of open source tools under the roof of the Apache Software Foundation. The toolkit is written in Java and offers almost complete SVG 1.1 support, as well as some features that were originally planned for SVG 1.2.
trans-unit.target: Batik是Apache软件基金会旗下的一套开源工具。该工具包是用Java编写的,提供了几乎完整的SVG 1.1支持,以及一些原计划用于SVG 1.2的功能。

trans-unit.source: Batik offers a viewer (Squiggle), a rasterizer for PNG output, an SVG pretty printer to format SVG files, and a TrueType-to-SVG-Font converter.
trans-unit.target: Batik提供了一个查看器(Squiggle)、一个用于PNG输出的光栅化器、一个用于格式化SVG文件的SVG漂亮打印机,以及一个TrueType-to-SVG-Font转换器。

trans-unit.source: Because setting externalResourcesRequired="true" on a container element will have the effect of disabling progressive display of the contents of that container, if that container includes elements that reference external resources, authors should avoid simply setting externalResourcesRequired="true" on the outermost <svg> element on a universal basis. Instead, it is better to specify externalResourcesRequired="true" on those particular graphics elements or container elements which specifically need the availability of external resources in order to render properly.
trans-unit.target: 因为设置 externalResourcesRequired="true" 的容器元素信息将具有禁用的该容器的内容物渐进显示的效果，如果该容器包括元素参考外部资源，作者应避免简单地设置 externalResourcesRequired="true" 在最外 <svg> 元素具有通用性。相反，最好在那些特别需要外部资源的可用性才能正确渲染的特定图形元素或容器元素上指定 externalResourcesRequired="true" 。

trans-unit.source: Because setting externalResourcesRequired="true" on a container element will have the effect of disabling progressive display of the contents of that container, if that container includes elements that reference external resources, authors should avoid simply setting externalResourcesRequired="true" on the outermost svg element on a universal basis. Instead, it is better to specify externalResourcesRequired="true" on those particular graphics elements or container elements which specifically need the availability of external resources in order to render properly.
trans-unit.target: 因为在容器元素上设置 externalResourcesRequired="true" 会导致禁用该容器内容的渐进显示，所以如果该容器包含引用外部资源的元素，那么作者应该避免在最外面的svg上简单地设置 externalResourcesRequired="true" 普遍性的元素。相反，最好在那些特别需要外部资源的可用性才能正确渲染的特定图形元素或容器元素上指定 externalResourcesRequired="true" 。

trans-unit.source: Blinking and flashing animation can be problematic for people with cognitive concerns such as Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD). Additionally, certain kinds of motion can be a trigger for Vestibular disorders, epilepsy, and migraine and Scotopic sensitivity.
trans-unit.target: 眨眼和闪烁的动画对于有认知问题的人来说可能是个问题,比如注意力缺陷多动症(ADHD)。此外,某些类型的运动可能是前庭疾病、癫痫、偏头痛和Scotopic敏感症的诱因。

trans-unit.source: Blurring is computation heavy, so ensure to use it sparingly, especially in elements that get scrolled or animated.
trans-unit.target: 模糊是重计算的,所以要保证少用,尤其是在滚动或动画的元素中。

trans-unit.source: Both curves produce similar results, although the cubic allows you greater freedom in exactly what your curve looks like. Deciding which curve to use is situational and depends on the amount of symmetry your line has.
trans-unit.target: 这两种曲线都能产生类似的结果,不过立方体曲线可以让你在曲线的具体样子上有更大的自由度。决定使用哪一条曲线是根据具体情况而定的,取决于你的线条的对称性。

trans-unit.source: Both curves produce similar results, although the cubic one allows greater freedom in exactly what the curve looks like. Deciding which curve to use is situational and depends on the amount of symmetry the line has.
trans-unit.target: 两种曲线都会产生类似的结果,尽管立方体的曲线在曲线的具体样子上有更大的自由度。决定使用哪条曲线是因地制宜的,取决于线的对称性。

trans-unit.source: Both gradients also have an attribute named gradientUnits, which describes the unit system you're going to use when you describe the size or orientation of the gradient. There are two possible values to use here: userSpaceOnUse or objectBoundingBox. objectBoundingBox is the default, so that's what has been shown so far. It essentially scales the gradient to the size of your object, so you only have to specify coordinates in values from zero to one, and they're scaled to the size of your object automatically for you. userSpaceOnUse essentially takes in absolute units. So you have to know where your object is, and place the gradient at the same place. The radialGradient above would be rewritten:
trans-unit.target: 这两个渐变都具有一个名为 gradientUnits 的属性，该属性描述在描述渐变的大小或方向时要使用的单位系统。这里有两个可能的值： userSpaceOnUse 或 objectBoundingBox 。 objectBoundingBox 是默认值，所以到目前为止已经显示了这一点。它实际上将渐变缩放到对象的大小，因此您只需要指定从零到一的值中的坐标，它们就会自动为您缩放到对象的大小。 userSpaceOnUse 本质上采用绝对单位。因此，您必须知道对象的位置，并将渐变放置在同一位置。上面的radialGradient将被重写：

trans-unit.source: Both linear and radial gradients also take a few other attributes to describe transformations they may undergo. The only other one I want to mention here is the spreadMethod attribute. This attribute controls what happens when the gradient reaches its end, but the object isn't filled yet. It can take on one of three values, "pad", "reflect", or "repeat". "Pad" is what you have seen so far. When the gradient reaches its end, the final offset color is used to fill the rest of the object. "reflect" causes the gradient to continue on, but reflected in reverse, starting with the color offset at 100% and moving back to the offset at 0%, and then back up again. "Repeat" also lets the gradient continue, but instead of going backwards, it just jumps back to the beginning and runs again.
trans-unit.target: 线性和径向渐变还具有其他一些属性来描述它们可能经历的转换。我要在这里唯一提及的 spreadMethod 是spreadMethod属性。此属性控制渐变到达其末端但对象尚未填充时发生的情况。它可以采用以下三个值之一：“ pad”，“ reflect”或“ repeat”。到目前为止，您已经看到了“ Pad”。当渐变到达其末端时，最终的偏移颜色将用于填充对象的其余部分。 “反射”会导致渐变继续，但会反向反射，从100％的颜色偏移开始，然后移回0％的偏移，然后再次返回。 “重复”还可以让渐变继续，但不要倒退，它只是跳回到开头并再次运行。

trans-unit.source: By default, pointer-events must not be dispatched on the clipped (non-visible) regions of a shape. For example, a circle with a radius of 10 which is clipped to a circle with a radius of 5 will not receive "click" events outside the smaller radius.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， pointer-events 不得在形状的裁剪（不可见）区域上分派。例如，将半径为10的圆裁剪为半径为5的圆将不会在较小半径之外接收“点击”事件。

trans-unit.source: Contrary to popular opinion, the answer to this question is not "it can tell from the DOCTYPE declaration". DTDs were never designed with mixed content in mind, and past attempts to create mixed content DTDs are now considered to have failed. XML, and some XML dialects (SVG included), don't require a DOCTYPE declaration, and SVG 1.2 won't even have one. The fact that DOCTYPE declarations (usually) match the content in single content type files is merely coincidental. DTDs are for validation only, not identification of content. User agents that cheat and identify XML content using its DOCTYPE declaration cause harm.
trans-unit.target: 与流行观点相反，此问题的答案不是“它可以从 DOCTYPE 声明中看出来”。在设计DTD时从未考虑过混合内容，因此过去创建混合内容DTD的尝试现在都被认为失败了。 XML和某些XML方言（包括SVG）不需要 DOCTYPE 声明，并且SVG 1.2甚至都没有DOCTYPE声明。 DOCTYPE 声明（通常）与单个内容类型文件中的内容匹配的事实仅仅是偶然的。 DTD仅用于验证，不用于内容识别。使用其 DOCTYPE 声明欺骗和标识XML内容的用户代理会造成危害。

trans-unit.source: Describes a syncbase and an optional offset from that syncbase. The element's animation start time is defined relative to the begin or active end of another animation. A syncbase consists of an ID reference to another animation element followed by either .begin or .end to identify whether to synchronize with the beginning or active end of the referenced animation element.
trans-unit.target: 描述一个syncbase和一个可选的从偏移syncbase。元素的动画开始时间是相对于另一个动画的开始或活动结束定义的。甲syncbase包括ID参照另一个动画元件，接着为无论的 .begin 或 .end 以识别是否与引用的动画元素的开始或主动端同步。

trans-unit.source: Describes a qualified repeat event. The element animation start time is defined relative to the time that the repeat event is raised with the specified iteration value.
trans-unit.target: 描述一个合格的重复事件。元素动画开始时间是相对于重复事件用指定的迭代值引发的时间来定义的。

trans-unit.source: Describes an accessKey that should trigger the animation. The element animation will begin when the user presses the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 描述应该触发动画的 accessKey 。当用户按下指定的键时，元素动画将开始。

trans-unit.source: Describes an event and an optional offset that determines the time at which the element's animation should begin. The animation start time is defined relative to the time that the specified event is fired. A valid event-value consists of an element ID followed by a dot and one of the supported events for that element. All the valid events (not necessarily supported by all elements) are: focusin, focusout, activate, click, mousedown, mouseup, mouseover, mousemove, mouseout, DOMSubtreeModified, DOMNodeInserted, DOMNodeRemoved, DOMNodeRemovedFromDocument, DOMNodeInsertedIntoDocument, DOMAttrModified, DOMCharacterDataModified, SVGLoad, SVGUnload, SVGAbort, SVGError, SVGResize, SVGScroll, SVGZoom, beginEvent, endEvent and repeatEvent.
trans-unit.target: 描述一个事件和一个可选的偏移量，该偏移量确定元素动画应开始的时间。动画开始时间是相对于触发指定事件的时间定义的。有效的事件值由元素ID，后跟一个点和该元素支持的事件之一组成。所有有效事件（不一定受所有元素支持）是： focusin ， focusout ， activate ， click ， mousedown ， mouseup ， mouseover ， mousemove ， mouseout ， DOMSubtreeModified ， DOMNodeInserted ， DOMNodeRemoved ， DOMNodeRemovedFromDocument ， DOMNodeInsertedIntoDocument ， DOMAttrModified ， DOMCharacterDataModified ， SVGLoad ， SVGUnload ， SVGAbort ， SVGError ， SVGResize ， SVGScroll ， SVGZoom ， beginEvent ， endEvent 和 repeatEvent 。

trans-unit.source: Describes the animation start time as a real-world clock time. The time syntax is based upon the syntax defined in ISO8601.
trans-unit.target: 将动画的开始时间描述为现实世界的时钟时间。时间语法是基于ISO8601中定义的语法。

trans-unit.source: Draw a cubic Bézier curve from the current point to the end point specified by x,y. The start control point is specified by x1,y1 and the end control point is specified by x2,y2. Any subsequent triplet(s) of coordinate pairs are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit absolute cubic Bézier curve (C) command(s). Formulae: Po' = Pn = {x, y} ; Pcs = {x1, y1} ; Pce = {x2, y2}
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到 x ， y 指定的终点绘制三次贝塞尔曲线。的开始控制点是由规定的 x1 ， y1 和末端控制点是由规定的 x2 ， y2 。坐标对的任何后续三元组都将解释为隐式绝对三次贝塞尔曲线（ C ）命令的参数。公式：P o ' = P n = { x ， y }; P cs = { x1 ， y1 }; P ce = { x2 ， y2 }

trans-unit.source: Draw a cubic Bézier curve from the current point to the end point, which is the current point shifted by dx along the x-axis and dy along the y-axis. The start control point is the current point (starting point of the curve) shifted by dx1 along the x-axis and dy1 along the y-axis. The end control point is the current point (starting point of the curve) shifted by dx2 along the x-axis and dy2 along the y-axis. Any subsequent triplet(s) of coordinate pairs are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit relative cubic Bézier curve (c) command(s). Formulae: Po' = Pn = {xo + dx, yo + dy} ; Pcs = {xo + dx1, yo + dy1} ; Pce = {xo + dx2, yo + dy2}
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到终点绘制三次贝塞尔曲线，该曲线是当前点在x轴上偏移 dx ，在y轴上偏移 dy 的位置。的开始控制点是当前点（起始曲线的点）移位 dx1 沿x轴和 dy1 沿y轴。的最后一个控制点在当前点（起始曲线的点）移位 dx2 沿x轴和 dy2 沿y轴。坐标对的任何后续三元组都将解释为隐式相对三次贝塞尔曲线（ c ）命令的参数。公式：P o ' = P n = {x o + dx ，y o + dy }; P cs = {x o + dx1 ，y o + dy1 }; P ce = {x o + dx2 ，y o + dy2 }

trans-unit.source: Draw a cubic Bézier curve from the current point to the end point, which is the current point shifted by dx along the x-axis and dy along the y-axis. The start control point is the current point (starting point of the curve) shifted by dx1 along the x-axis and dy1 along the y-axis. The end control point is the current point (starting point of the curve) shifted by dx2 along the x-axis and dy2 along the y-axis. Any subsequent triplet(s) of coordinate pairs are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit relative cubic Bézier curve (c) command(s).
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到终点绘制三次贝塞尔曲线，该曲线是当前点在x轴上偏移 dx ，在y轴上偏移 dy 的位置。的开始控制点是当前点（起始曲线的点）移位 dx1 沿x轴和 dy1 沿y轴。的最后一个控制点在当前点（起始曲线的点）移位 dx2 沿x轴和 dy2 沿y轴。坐标对的任何后续三元组都将解释为隐式相对三次贝塞尔曲线（ c ）命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: Draw a cubic Bézier curve from the current point to the end point specified by x,y. The start control point is specified by x1,y1 and the end control point is specified by x2,y2. Any subsequent triplet(s) of coordinate pairs are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit absolute cubic Bézier curve (C) command(s).
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到 x ， y 指定的终点绘制三次贝塞尔曲线。的开始控制点是由规定的 x1 ， y1 和末端控制点是由规定的 x2 ， y2 。坐标对的任何后续三元组都将解释为隐式绝对三次贝塞尔曲线（ C ）命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: Draw a horizontal line from the current point to the end point, which is specified by the current point shifted by dx along the x-axis and the current point's y coordinate. Any subsequent value(s) are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit relative horizontal LineTo (h) command(s). Formula: Po' = Pn = {xo + dx, yo}
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到终点绘制一条水平线，该水平线由沿x轴和当前点的 y坐标偏移 dx 的当前点指定。任何后续值都将解释为隐式相对水平LineTo（ h ）命令的参数。公式：P o ' = P n = {x o + dx ，y o }

trans-unit.source: Draw a horizontal line from the current point to the end point, which is specified by the x parameter and the current point's y coordinate. Any subsequent value(s) are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit absolute horizontal LineTo (H) command(s). Formula: Po' = Pn = {x, yo}
trans-unit.target: 在当前点到终点之间绘制一条水平线，该水平线由 x 参数和当前点的 y坐标指定。任何后续值都将解释为隐式绝对水平LineTo（ H ）命令的参数。公式：P o ' = P n = { x ，y o }

trans-unit.source: Draw a horizontal line from the current point to the end point, which is specified by the current point shifted by dx along the x-axis and the current point'sy coordinate. Any subsequent value(s) are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit relative horizontal LineTo (h) command(s).
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到终点绘制一条水平线，该水平线由当前点沿x轴偏移 dx 以及当前点的 y 坐标指定。任何后续值都将解释为隐式相对水平LineTo（ h ）命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: Draw a horizontal line from the current point to the end point, which is specified by the x parameter and the current point'sy coordinate. Any subsequent value(s) are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit absolute horizontal LineTo (H) command(s).
trans-unit.target: 在当前点到终点之间绘制一条水平线，该水平线由 x 参数和当前点的 y 坐标指定。任何后续值都将解释为隐式绝对水平LineTo（ H ）命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: Draw a line from the current point to the end point, which is the current point shifted by dx along the x-axis and dy along the y-axis. Any subsequent coordinate pair(s) are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit relative LineTo (l) command(s) (see below). Formula: Po' = Pn = {xo + dx, yo + dy}
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到终点画一条线，该点是当前点在x轴上偏移 dx ，在y轴上偏移 dy 的位置。任何后续的坐标对都将解释为隐式相对LineTo（ l ）命令的参数（请参见下文）。公式：P o ' = P n = {x o + dx ，y o + dy }

trans-unit.source: Draw a line from the current point to the end point specified by x,y. Any subsequent coordinate pair(s) are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit absolute LineTo (L) command(s). Formula: Po' = Pn = {x, y}
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到由 x ， y 指定的终点画一条线。任何后续坐标对都将解释为隐式绝对LineTo（ L ）命令的参数。公式：P o ' = P n = { x ， y }

trans-unit.source: Draw a line from the current point to the end point, which is the current point shifted by dx along the x-axis and dy along the y-axis. Any subsequent coordinate pair(s) are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit relative LineTo (l) command(s) (see below).
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到终点画一条线，该点是当前点在x轴上偏移 dx ，在y轴上偏移 dy 的位置。任何后续的坐标对都将解释为隐式相对LineTo（ l ）命令的参数（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: Draw a line from the current point to the end point specified by x,y. Any subsequent coordinate pair(s) are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit absolute LineTo (L) command(s).

trans-unit.source: Draw a quadratic Bézier curve from the current point to the end point specified by x,y. The control point is specified by x1,y1. Any subsequent pair(s) of coordinate pairs are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit absolute quadratic Bézier curve (Q) command(s). Formulae: Po' = Pn = {x, y} ; Pc = {x1, y1}
trans-unit.target: 从当前点到由 x ， y 指定的终点绘制二次贝塞尔曲线。的控制点是由规定的 x1 ， y1 。坐标对的任何后续对都将解释为隐式绝对二次Bézier曲线（ Q ）命令的参数。公式：P o ' = P n = { x ， y }; P c = { x1 ， y1 }

trans-unit.source: Draw a quadratic Bézier curve from the current point to the end point, which is the current point shifted by dx along the x-axis and dy along the y-axis. The control point is the current point (starting point of the curve) shifted by dx1 along the x-axis and dy1 along the y-axis. Any subsequent pair(s) of coordinate pairs are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit relative quadratic Bézier curve (q) command(s). Formulae: Po' = Pn = {xo + dx, yo + dy} ; Pc = {xo + dx1, yo + dy1}
trans-unit.target: 绘制从当前点到终点的二次贝塞尔曲线，该曲线是当前点沿x轴偏移 dx 且沿y轴偏移 dy 的当前点。的控制点是当前点（起始曲线的点）移位 dx1 沿x轴和 dy1 沿y轴。坐标对的任何后续对都将解释为隐式相对二次贝塞尔曲线（ q ）命令的参数。公式：P o ' = P n = {x o + dx ，y o+ dy }; P c = {x o + dx1 ，y o + dy1 }

trans-unit.target: 从当前点到 x ， y 指定的终点绘制二次贝塞尔曲线。的控制点是由规定的 x1 ， y1 。坐标对的任何后续对都将解释为隐式绝对二次Bézier曲线（ Q ）命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: Draw a smooth cubic Bézier curve from the current point to the end point specified by x,y. The end control point is specified by x2,y2. The start control point is a reflection of the end control point of the previous curve command. Any subsequent pair(s) of coordinate pairs are interpreted as parameter(s) for implicit absolute smooth cubic Bézier curve (S) commands.

trans-unit.source: Drop shadow example
trans-unit.target: 阴影示例

trans-unit.source: Due to the potentially massive size SVG files can reach when used for some applications (e.g., geographical applications), the SVG specification also allows for gzip-compressed SVG files. The recommended filename extension for these files is ".svgz" (all lowercase). Unfortunately it is very problematic to get gzip-compressed SVG files to work reliably across all SVG capable user agents when served from Microsofts IIS server, and Firefox can not load gzip-compressed SVG from the local computer. Avoid gzip-compressed SVG except when you are publishing to a webserver that you know will serve it correctly (see below).
trans-unit.target: 由于SVG文件在用于某些应用(如地理应用)时可能会达到巨大的尺寸,SVG规范还允许使用gzip压缩的SVG文件。这些文件的推荐扩展名是".svgz"(全部为小写)。不幸的是,当从Microsofts IIS服务器提供服务时,要让gzip压缩的SVG文件在所有支持SVG的用户代理中可靠地工作是非常困难的,而且Firefox不能从本地计算机加载gzip压缩的SVG。避免使用gzip压缩的SVG,除非你要发布到一个你知道会正确服务的web服务器上(见下文)。

trans-unit.source: Due to the potentially massive size SVG files can reach when used for some applications (e.g., geographical applications), the SVG specification also allows for gzip-compressed SVG files. The recommended filename extension for these files is ".svgz" (all lowercase). Unfortunately, it is very problematic to get gzip-compressed SVG files to work reliably across all SVG capable user agents when served from a Microsoft IIS server, and Firefox cannot load gzip-compressed SVG from the local computer. Avoid gzip-compressed SVG except when you are publishing to a webserver that you know will serve it correctly (see below).
trans-unit.target: 由于SVG文件在用于某些应用(如地理应用)时可能会达到巨大的尺寸,SVG规范还允许使用gzip压缩的SVG文件。这些文件的推荐扩展名是".svgz"(全部为小写)。不幸的是,当从Microsoft IIS服务器提供服务时,要让gzip压缩的SVG文件在所有支持SVG的用户代理中可靠地工作是非常困难的,而且Firefox不能从本地计算机加载gzip压缩的SVG。避免使用gzip压缩的SVG,除非你要发布到一个你知道会正确服务的web服务器上(见下文)。

trans-unit.source: Each SVG profile should define the text that is appropriate for this attribute.

trans-unit.source: Each SVG profile should define the text that is appropriate for this attribute. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of none were specified.
trans-unit.target: 每个SVG概要文件都应定义适合此属性的文本。如果未指定该属性，则效果类似于未指定 none 值。

trans-unit.source: Each container element or graphics element in an SVG drawing can supply a <title> element containing a description string where the description is text-only. When the current SVG document fragment is rendered as SVG on visual media, <title> element is not rendered as part of the graphics. However, some user agents may, for example, display the <title> element as a tooltip. Alternate presentations are possible, both visual and aural, which display the <title> element but do not display path elements or other graphics elements. The <title> element generally improves accessibility of SVG documents.
trans-unit.target: SVG绘图中的每个容器元素或图形元素都可以提供 <title> 元素，其中包含描述字符串，其中描述为纯文本。当当前SVG文档片段在视觉媒体上呈现为SVG时， <title> 元素不会呈现为图形的一部分。但是，某些用户代理可能会例如显示 <title> 元素作为工具提示。视觉和听觉的替代显示都是可能的，它们显示 <title> 元素，但不显示 path 元素或其他图形元素。所述 <title> 元素通常提高SVG文档的可访问性。

trans-unit.source: Each container element or graphics element in an SVG drawing can supply a description string using the <desc> element where the description is text-only.
trans-unit.target: SVG工程图中的每个容器元素或图形元素都可以使用 <desc> 元素提供描述字符串，其中描述为纯文本。

trans-unit.source: Each control point description is a set of four values: x1 y1 x2 y2, describing the Bézier control points for one time segment. The keyTimes values that define the associated segment are the Bézier "anchor points", and the keySplines values are the control points. Thus, there must be one fewer sets of control points than there are keyTimes.
trans-unit.target: 每个控制点描述都是四个值的集合： x1 y1 x2 y2 ，描述一个时间段的贝塞尔曲线控制点。定义关联段的 keyTimes 值是贝塞尔“锚点”，而 keySplines 值是控制点。因此，控制点的数量必须少于 keyTimes 的数量。

trans-unit.source: Each hexadecimal digit, in the range 0 to F, represents one sRGB color component in the order red, green and blue. The digits A to F may be in either uppercase or lowercase. The value of the color component is obtained by replicating digits, so 0 become 00, 1 becomes 11, F becomes FF. This compact syntactical form can represent only 4096 colors. Examples: #000 (i.e. black) #fff (i.e. white) #6CF (i.e. #66CCFF, rgb(102, 204, 255)).
trans-unit.target: 范围从0到F的每个十六进制数字代表红色，绿色和蓝色顺序的一个sRGB颜色分量。数字A到F可以大写或小写。颜色分量的值是通过复制数字获得的，因此0变为00，1变为11，F变为FF。这种紧凑的语法形式只能代表4096种颜色。示例：＃000（即黑色）#fff（即白色）＃6CF（即＃66CCFF，rgb（102，204，255 ））。

trans-unit.target: 每个整数代表一个sRGB颜色成分,顺序为红、绿、蓝,用逗号隔开,也可以用空格隔开。每个整数都是以

trans-unit.source: Each of the commands is instantiated (for example, creating a class, naming and locating it) by a specific letter. For instance, let's move to the x and y coordinates (10, 10). The "Move to" command is called with the letter M. When the parser runs into this letter, it knows you want to move to a point. So, to move to (10,10) you would use the command "M 10 10". After that, the parser begins reading for the next command.
trans-unit.target: 每一个命令都是通过一个特定的字母来实例化的(例如,创建一个类,命名和定位)。例如,让我们移动到x和y坐标(10,10)。用字母M来调用 "Move to "命令,当解析器碰到这个字母时,它就知道你要移动到一个点。所以,如果要移动到(10,10),你会使用 "M 10 10 "命令。之后,解析器开始读取下一条命令。

trans-unit.source: Each of the commands is instantiated (for example, creating a class, naming and locating it) by a specific letter. For instance, let's move to the x and y coordinates (10, 10). The "Move to" command is called with the letter M. When the parser runs into this letter, it knows it needs to move to a point. So, to move to (10,10) the command to use would be M 10 10. After that, the parser begins reading for the next command.
trans-unit.target: 每个命令都由一个特定的字母实例化（例如，创建一个类，命名和定位它）。例如，让我们继续前进的X和Y坐标（ 10 ， 10 ）。用字母 M 调用“移至”命令。当解析器遇到此字母时，它知道需要移动到一个点。因此，移动到（ 10 ， 10 ）命令用途是 M 10 10 。之后，解析器开始读取下一条命令。

trans-unit.source: Each of these polylines has two segments. The joint where the two meet is controlled by the stroke-linejoin attribute. There are three possible values for this attribute. miter extends the line slightly beyond its normal width to create a square corner where only one angle is used. round creates a rounded line segment. bevel creates a new angle to aid in the transition between the two segments.
trans-unit.target: 这些折线中的每条都有两个线段。两者相遇的关节由 stroke-linejoin 属性控制。此属性有三个可能的值。 miter 将线稍微延伸超出其正常宽度，以创建仅使用一个角度的方角。 round 创建一个圆形的线段。 bevel 会创建一个新角度，以帮助两个线段之间的过渡。

trans-unit.source: Each pair of hexadecimal digits, in the range 0 to F, represents one sRGB color component in the order red, green and blue. The digits A to F may be in either uppercase or lowercase.This syntactical form, originally introduced by HTML, can represent 16777216 colors. Examples: #9400D3 (i.e. a dark violet), #FFD700 (i.e. a golden color).
trans-unit.target: 范围在0到F之间的每对十六进制数字代表红色，绿色和蓝色顺序的一个sRGB颜色分量。数字A到F可以大写或小写。最初由HTML引入的这种语法形式可以表示16777216种颜色。示例：＃9400D3（即深紫色），＃FFD700（即金色）。

trans-unit.source: Each percentage value represents one sRGB color component in the order red, green and blue, separated by a comma and optionally by white space. For colors inside the sRGB gamut, the range of each component is 0.0% to 100.0% and an arbitrary number of decimal places may be supplied. Scientific notation is not supported. This syntactical form can represent an arbitrary range of colors, completely covering the sRGB gamut. Color values where one or more components are below 0.0% or above 100.0% represent colors outside the sRGB gamut. Examples: rgb(12.375%, 34.286%, 28.97%).
trans-unit.target: 每个百分比值代表红色，绿色和蓝色顺序中的一个sRGB颜色分量，并用逗号分隔，还可以用空白分隔。对于sRGB色域内的颜色，每个分量的范围是0.0％到100.0％，并且可以提供任意数量的小数位。不支持科学计数法。这种语法形式可以代表任意颜色范围，完全覆盖sRGB色域。一种或多种成分低于0.0％或高于100.0％的颜色值表示sRGB色域之外的颜色。示例：rgb（12.375％，34.286％，28.97％）。

trans-unit.source: Each successive time value must be greater than or equal to the preceding time value.
trans-unit.target: 每个连续的时间值必须大于或等于前一个时间值。

trans-unit.source: Even if you don't use all those namespaces in a particular document, there's no harm in including the namespace declarations. It may save you from some annoying errors if you end up adding content from one of the unused namespaces at a later date.
trans-unit.target: 即使你不在某个文档中使用所有这些命名空间,加入命名空间声明也没有什么坏处。如果你最终在以后添加了来自某个未使用的命名空间的内容,这可能会使你免于一些恼人的错误。

trans-unit.source: Event attributes always have their name starting with "on" followed by the name of the event for which they are intended. They specifies some script to run when the event of the given type is dispatched to the element on which the attributes are specified.
trans-unit.target: 事件属性的名称总是以 "on "开头,后面跟着事件的名称。它们指定了一些脚本,当给定类型的事件被派发到指定属性的元素上时,这些脚本将被运行。

trans-unit.source: Filters Attributes
trans-unit.target: 过滤器属性

trans-unit.source: Filters are defined by <filter> element, which should be put in the <defs> section of your SVG file. Between the filter tags, goes a list of primitives, basic operations that build on top of the previous operations (like blurring, adding a lighting effect, etc). To apply your created filter on a graphic element, you set the filter attribute.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器由 <filter> 元素定义，该元素应放在SVG文件的 <defs> 部分中。在滤镜标签之间，有一系列基本元素，在先前操作之上构建的基本操作（如模糊，添加照明效果等）。要将创建的过滤器应用于图形元素，请设置 filter 属性。

trans-unit.source: Finallly, <feMerge> merges together "offsetBlur", which is the drop shadow, and "litPaint", which is the original source graphic with a lighting effect.
trans-unit.target: 最后， <feMerge> 将“ offsetBlur”（即投影）和“ litPaint”（即具有照明效果的原始源图形）合并在一起。

trans-unit.source: Finally SVG can be created dynamically with JavaScript and injected into the HTML DOM. With this method replacement technologies can be implemented for browsers which normally can't process SVG.
trans-unit.target: 最后,SVG可以用JavaScript动态创建,并注入到HTML DOM中。通过这种方法,可以实现通常不能处理SVG的浏览器的替换技术。

trans-unit.source: Finally, SVG can be created dynamically with JavaScript and injected into the HTML DOM. With this method, replacement technologies can be implemented for browsers which normally can't process SVG.
trans-unit.target: 最后,SVG可以用JavaScript动态创建,并注入到HTML DOM中。通过这种方法,可以实现对通常不能处理SVG的浏览器的替换技术。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can also use dashed line types on a stroke by specifying the stroke-dasharray attribute.
trans-unit.target: 最后，还可以通过指定 stroke-dasharray 属性在笔划上使用虚线类型。

trans-unit.source: First, a <rect> element is used to create and stroke a rectangle to contain the text. Then <text> is used to create the text element itself, with an id of "hello".
trans-unit.target: 首先，使用 <rect> 元素创建并描画包含文本的矩形。然后 <text> 用于创建文本元素本身，其 id 为 "hello" 。

trans-unit.source: First, a <rect> element is used to create and stroke a rectangle to contain the text. Then <text> is used to create the text element itself, with an id of "hello".
trans-unit.target: 首先， <rect> 元素用于创建和描边包含文本的矩形。然后 <text> 用于创建 id 为 "hello" 的文本元素本身。

trans-unit.source: Five elements are using this attribute: <animate>, <animateColor>, <animateMotion>, <animateTransform>, and <feColorMatrix>
trans-unit.target: 五个元素正在使用此属性： <animate> ， <animateColor> ， <animateMotion> ， <animateTransform> 和 <feColorMatrix>

trans-unit.source: Five elements are using this attribute: <animate>, <animateColor>, <animateMotion>, <animateTransform>, and <set>
trans-unit.target: 五个元素正在使用此属性： <animate> ， <animateColor> ， <animateMotion> ， <animateTransform> 和 <set>

trans-unit.source: Five elements are using this attribute: <marker>, <pattern>, <svg>, <symbol>, and <view>
trans-unit.target: 五个元素正在使用此属性： <marker> ， <pattern> ， <svg> ， <symbol> 和 <view>

trans-unit.source: Five elements are using this attribute: <marker>, <pattern>, <svg>, <symbol>, and <view>.

trans-unit.source: Flavors of SVG
trans-unit.target: SVG的味道

trans-unit.source: Float functional — rgb(R%, G%, B%)
trans-unit.target: 浮动功能-rgb（R％，G％，B％）

trans-unit.source: Following <font-face-src> is a <missing-glyph> element. This defines what should be displayed if a certain glyph is not found in the font and if there are no fallback mechanisms. It also shows how glyphs are created: By simply adding any graphical SVG content inside. You can use literally any other SVG elements in here, even <filter>, <a> or <script>. For simple glyphs, however, you can simply add a d attribute — this defines a shape for the glyph exactly like how standard SVG paths work.
trans-unit.target: 以下 <font-face-src> 是 <missing-glyph> 元件。这定义了如果在字体中找不到某个字形并且没有后备机制的情况下应该显示的内容。它还显示了如何创建字形：通过简单地在其中添加任何图形SVG内容。您可以在这里使用任何其他SVG元素，甚至 <filter> ， <a> 或 <script> 。但是，对于简单的字形，您可以简单地添加 d 属性-这为字形定义了形状，就像标准SVG路径的工作方式一样。

trans-unit.source: Font element
trans-unit.target: 字体元素

trans-unit.source: Font elements
trans-unit.target: 字体元素

trans-unit.source: For <a>, href defines the location of the referenced object, expressed as a URL reference.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <a> ， href 定义了引用对象的位置，表示为URL引用。

trans-unit.source: For <a>, xlink:href defines the location of the referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <a> ， xlink:href 定义了所引用对象的位置。

trans-unit.source: For <altGlyph>, fill is a presentation attribute that defines the color of the glyph.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <altGlyph> ， fill 是一个表示属性，它定义字形的颜色。

trans-unit.source: For <altGlyph>, fill is a presentation attribute that lets define what is the color of the glyph.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <altGlyph> ， fill 是一种表示属性，可以定义字形的颜色。

trans-unit.source: For <altGlyph>, x defines the x-axis coordinate of the alternate glyph.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <altGlyph> ， x 定义备用字形的x轴坐标。

trans-unit.source: For <altGlyph>, xlink:href defines the reference either to a <glyph> element in an SVG document fragment or to an <altGlyphDef> element.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <altGlyph> ， xlink:href 定义对SVG文档片段中的 <glyph> 元素或对 <altGlyphDef> 元素的引用。

trans-unit.source: For <altGlyph>, y defines the y-axis coordinate of the alternate glyph.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <altGlyph> ， y 定义备用字形的y轴坐标。

trans-unit.source: For <altGlyph>, if it contains a single value, dx defines a shift along the x-axis for all alternate glyph.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <altGlyph> ，如果它包含单个值，则 dx 定义所有替代字形沿x轴的移动。

trans-unit.source: For <altGlyph>, if it contains a single value, dy defines a shift along the y-axis for all alternate glyph.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <altGlyph> ，如果它包含单个值，则 dy 定义所有替代字形沿y轴的移动。

trans-unit.source: For <animate>, <animateColor>, <animateMotion>, <animateTransform>, and <set>, begin defines when the element should begin, i.e. become active.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <animate> ， <animateColor> ， <animateMotion> ， <animateTransform> 和 <set> ， begin 定义元素应从何时开始（即变为活动状态）。

trans-unit.source: For <animate>, <animateColor>, <animateMotion>, <animateTransform>, and <set>, xlink:href defines the reference to the element which is the target of this animation and which therefore will be modified over time.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <animate> ， <animateColor> ， <animateMotion> ， <animateTransform> 和 <set> ， xlink:href 定义对元素的引用，该元素是此动画的目标，因此将随着时间的推移进行修改。

trans-unit.source: For <animate>, <animateColor>, <animateMotion>, and <animateTransform>, to specifies the ending value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <animate> ， <animateColor> ， <animateMotion> ，和 <animateTransform> ， to 指定动画的结束值。

trans-unit.source: For <animate>, <animateColor>, <animateMotion>, and <animateTransform>, values is a list of values defining the sequence of values over the course of the animation. If this attribute is specified, any from, to, and by attribute values set on the element are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <animate> ， <animateColor> ， <animateMotion> 和 <animateTransform> ， values 是一个值列表，这些值定义了动画过程中的值序列。如果指定了此属性，则将忽略元素上设置的 from ， to 和 by 属性值。
